summary: This is an email chain from July 2020 forwarding an invitation to a virtual discussion hosted by ECPAT-USA about the Netflix documentary 'Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich'. The event features a director, a psychologist, and a judge, and is promoted by the Brooklyn Human Trafficking Task Force.

persons.name: Lisa Bryant
persons.context: Featured as a speaker in the ECPAT-USA discussion about the documentary 'Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich'.

persons.name: Kathryn Stamoulis
persons.context: Featured as a speaker in the ECPAT-USA discussion about the documentary 'Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich'.

persons.name: Fernando Camacho
persons.context: Featured as a speaker in the ECPAT-USA discussion about the documentary 'Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich'.

persons.name: Lori L. Cohen
persons.context: Moderating the ECPAT-USA discussion about the documentary 'Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the documentary and discussion; described as using his wealth and power to carry out abuses.

events.title: ECPAT-USA Discussion on Jeffrey Epstein Documentary
events.description: A virtual Zoom discussion hosted by ECPAT-USA about the Netflix documentary series 'Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich', featuring director Lisa Bryant, psychologist Kathryn Stamoulis, and Hon. Fernando Camacho, moderated by Lori L. Cohen.

keyFacts: The Brooklyn Human Trafficking Task Force is promoting an ECPAT-USA event about Jeffrey Epstein in July 2020.
The event discusses the Netflix documentary 'Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich', which examines how Epstein used wealth and power to carry out sexual abuse.
ECPAT-USA's mission is to protect children from sexual exploitation and trafficking.
The document is an internal email forward within law enforcement/FBI circles regarding a public awareness event.
